title: Recent Analysts’ Ratings Updates for Chartwell Retirement Residences (CSH.UN)
content:
Chartwell Retirement Residences (TSE: CSH.UN) recently received a number of ratings updates from brokerages and research firms: 

9/15/2015 – Chartwell Retirement Residences had its price target raised by analysts at Scotiabank from C$13.25 to C$13.50. They now have a “sector perform” rating on the stock. 

9/15/2015 – Chartwell Retirement Residences had its price target raised by analysts at RBC Capital from C$13.00 to C$14.00. They now have a “sector perform” rating on the stock. 

9/3/2015 – Chartwell Retirement Residences had its price target raised by analysts at Scotiabank from C$12.75 to C$13.25. 

9/3/2015 – Chartwell Retirement Residences had its price target raised by analysts at BMO Capital Markets to C$15.25. They now have an “outperform” rating on the stock. 

9/3/2015 – Chartwell Retirement Residences had its price target raised by analysts at Canaccord Genuity to C$15.00. They now have a “buy” rating on the stock. 

8/7/2015 – Chartwell Retirement Residences was given a new C$12.75 price target on by analysts at Scotiabank. They now have a “sector perform” rating on the stock.
